channel.title: CVE Feed for origincode -- WordPress Photo Gallery – Image Gallery
channel.description: The latest CVEs for origincode -- WordPress Photo Gallery – Image Gallery

item.title: CVE-2021-4384|2024-08-03T17:23:10.725Z -- origincode -- wordpress%20photo%20gallery%20%E2%80%93%20image%20gallery
item.description: The WordPress Photo Gallery – Image Gallery plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 1.0.6. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the load_images_thumbnail() and edit_gallery() functions. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to edit galleries via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
